Package gameLogic

Class Board

java.lang.Object
gameLogic.Board
public class Board
extends Object
Store the dimension of the Game Play Area. Manages all movable and non-movable objects in the Game Play Area.

  • Constructor Summary

    Board​(int level, int scoreAmount, Timer oldTimer)
    Non Default Constructor (Board Class) To be used for recreating board when transiting to next level.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(int level)
      Non-Default Constructor (Board Class).
      Parameters:
      level - An integer defining the difficulty selected.

    • Board

      public Board​(int level, int scoreAmount)
      Non Default Constructor (Board Class). To be used for recreating board when transiting to next level.
      Parameters:
      level - An integer defining the difficulty selected.
      scoreAmount - An integer holding the current score from the current level.

    • Board

      public Board​(int level, int scoreAmount, Timer oldTimer)
      Non Default Constructor (Board Class) To be used for recreating board when transiting to next level.
      Parameters:
      level - An integer defining the difficulty selected.
      scoreAmount - An integer holding the current score from the current level.
      oldTimer - A timer class that has the old information.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver​(Enemy enemy)
      test the game is over or not.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy info.
      Returns:
      true if enemy catch the player or score become negative, else return false.
